MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Haulfryn, Pant Isa and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.55am. Our engineers have arrived on site in the area and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.22am on 28th April 2021.
